Reno.Veterans of Foreign Wars Building: The Veterans of Foreign Wars Building in Reno, Nevada, located at 301 Burris Ln., is a historic building that was listed on the U.S. National Register of Historic Places in 2008. With address of 240 W. Moana Lane, the building is reportedly listed on the National Register. The building was a combined work of VFW Post 207 (founded 1926) and VFW Post 9211 (founded 1944), and includes a "semi-subterranean hall" in Reno's Tighe Park.
